scripts.postinstall: npm run get_git_dependencies && npm run compile_closure_compiler
scripts.get_git_dependencies: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.compile_closure_compiler: if [ ! -e tools/closure-compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ]; then mvn clean install -DskipTests --file tools/closure-compiler/pom.xml; fi
scripts.lint: if [ $(find src -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then jscs --config src/.jscsrc src/*.js; fi
scripts.precompile: npm run compile_closure_compiler && npm run clean && mkdir build
